Installation of typescript compiler :
-----------------------------------
1. NodeJs (link - https://nodejs.org/en/download)
2. npm init -y 
3. npm (node package manager) - used to install node packages (or any javascript relared libraries/dependencies)
4.need to install typescript compiler 
npm install typescript --save-dev 
5.npx tsc 
6.Configuring the compiler -

  npx tsc --init
